attributes.additional_details: Stop VAT on Vet Bills. Vets is an essential service and No VAT should be added. Animals are being put at risk.
attributes.background: Vet Surgery and Treatment is Not a Luxury Item.  VAT is an added expense that could be the difference between an owner affording the treatment or not. Dentistry as an example is one of the most expensive treatments.
